text: (huisaneun) gananhan jadeul-eul wihan geos-ini geudeul-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo jeyag-eul bad-a daejileul tteonal su eobsnola. mujihan janeun jeoljeham-eulo inhae geudeul-eul bujalo saeng-gaghadeola. geudaeneun geudeul-ui pyojing-eulosseo geudeul-eul almyeo, geudeul-eun yeogijeogi salamdeul-ege gugeolhaji anhnola. geudaedeul-i jaesan-eulosseo huisahandamyeon sillo hananimkkeseoneun geugeos-eul asineun bun-ila
